recycle.name: recycle
recycle.text:
<recycle>
draw 1 card when 1 artifact move to grave

berserk.name: berserk
berserk.text:
<berserk>
equip artifact cost no action point

mana_tide.name: mana_tide
mana_tide.text:
<mana tide>
next spell you cast this turn
cost no action point

quick_draw.name: quick_draw
quick_draw.text:
<quick draw>
next artifact you equip this turn
cost no action point

eagle_eye.name: eagle_eye
eagle_eye.text:
<eagle eye>
your next attack this turn
can't be vanished

charge.name: charge
charge.text:
<charge>
add one additional turn after this turn

stun.name: stun
stun.text:
<stun>
action point -1 and can't use chanting spell this turn

freeze.name: freeze
freeze.text:
<freeze>
you can't attack or use item this turn

petrify.name: petrify
petrify.text:
<petrify>
you can only draw card this turn

triumph.name: triumph
triumph.text:
<triumph>
your attack can't be vanished
when having 3 or more artifact on battle

decay.name: decay
decay.text:
<decay>
turn down specific artifacts after vanish is used

fortify.name: fortify
fortify.text:
<fortify>
artifacts on your battle field
can't be destroy, break, or turn
